Desc.entry: Registration of births, stillbirths, deaths and marriages for the Sheffield Registration District. Preliminaries to marriage and civil partnership and civil partnership and citizenship ceremonies. Also provide a Nationality Checking service. The aim of the Nationality Checking service is to reduce unnecessary delays in the process of applying for British citizenship by working in partnership with the Home Office. The service ensures the application form is completed correctly; checks, copies and certifies passports and other documents; ensures correct payment is sent and sends application safely and quickly to the Home Office.

DisabledAccess.entry: Changing Places Toilet available in this building
